properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 8 at 3:14AM CST until February 9 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Green Bay WI
properties.description:
...SNOW EXPECTED ON SUNDAY...

.A low pressure system will track from the Plain towards southern
Wisconsin on Sunday. Snow will spread across the area from
southwest to northeast during the morning, continue through
afternoon, and then end during the evening.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches possible.

* WHERE...Wood, Portage, Waupaca and Waushara Counties.

* WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected from late
morning into early afternoon, which will create much lower
visibility along with slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
